_sText:
Lunar Jail and Research Facility
==================
A collaborative jailbreak map from Ollie (ba_jail_xtreme_downview, ba_jail_bunker) and Noodle (ba_jail_mia_darkcells). 

This Map Includes:
==================
- Spawns and stability for 60 players
- Aesthetic and interesting design
- Futuristic appeal and features
- Random weapon spawner in cells
- Vent cell with multiple exits
- Hidden weapons
- Holographic armory
- Multiple levels
- Dynamic guard towers
- Many **secrets** including power ups!

Games
=====
- Dynamic multi-court including Football, Basketball and Ice Hockey
- Pool with lane dividers and diving board
- Dodgeball
- Total Wipeout
- Kitchen with dynamic lifts
- Medic
- Hide and Seek showers
- Low Gravity artifical environment
